title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/CPU support.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync/async chat, embed, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, generate, embed, create models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; folders, multi-user, code highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, custom model creation.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, markdown output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilot with autocomplete.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda, rocm, cpu) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, embed, list, pull; supports streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama REST API; serde types, streaming, tokio based.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript gateway that lets any GPTScript call local Ollama models as if they were OpenAI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers slash commands using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generate, chat, embed, pull, create; supports streaming.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with thread support.
